about.title: {{{ emote }}} Informations √† propos d'{{{ name }}}:
about.embed.text:
Hello!
I am a general purpose bot for all Discord communities.
I provide you necessary tools to meet your needs, from utility to fun features you can fully enjoy me.
You can get below some useful information about me.

donators.embedDescription:
Donations are required to host the bot, support the developer and pay all third-part services that the bot uses.
By donating for Homer, you let me upgrade servers which host the bot to allow more security, scalability and performance.
I accept donations via PayPal.me at this address: [click here]({{{ link }}}).
**Note**: Once you donated, please send me a DM with your PayPal account name so I can identify you.

Thank you ‚ù§

format.embed.explanation:
Cette commande vous permet de personnaliser l'affichage de la date et de l'heure.
Vous pouvez modifier ces param√®tres avec `{{{ prefix }}}format date` et `{{{ prefix }}}format time`.
Renseignez-vous avec la documentation juste au-dessous pour obtenir les param√®tres utilisables.
